import './Review.css' import { Col, Container, Image, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; function Review(){ const ArraysOfReview = [{ id: 1, title: 'Username', text: 'Lorem ipsum dolor', review: 'Comment' }] const ArraysOfReviewOnMap = ArraysOfReview.map((ArrayOfReview)=>

{ArrayOfReview.title}

{ArrayOfReview.text}

{ArrayOfReview.date}

{ArrayOfReview.review}

) return( {ArraysOfReviewOnMap} ) } export default Review
